GSD.description:
ARM: versatile: Add missing of_node_put in dcscb_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit a0fc05cd17617e63fc13ad0c01f3f0afd890d8ec. For more details please see the references link.
